message_1: What is the balanced chemical equation for the single replacement reaction between silver nitrate (AgNO3) and copper (Cu)?
message_2:
In a single replacement reaction, one element replaces another element in a compound. In this case, copper (Cu) will replace silver (Ag) in silver nitrate (AgNO3). The balanced chemical equation for this reaction is:

2 AgNO3 (aq) + Cu (s) â†’ Cu(NO3)2 (aq) + 2 Ag (s)
